name: E42
description: E42 is the world’s leading AI and NLP-powered no-code platform to build AI co-workers that automate complex people- and process-centric processes across functions. Having worked with more than 60 enterprises, bringing their business process automation idea to life—E42 is digitally transforming enterprises making them intelligent one AI co-worker at a time. This means not just huge cost savings but also innovation, disruption, and sustainable growth. E42’s far-reaching impact goes beyond significant cost savings, enabling enterprises to embrace innovation, disruption, and sustainable growth. With the deployment of AI co-workers, enterprises are experiencing a paradigm shift in how they operate. Tedious and time-consuming as well as complex business processes are automated, allowing employees to focus on high-value activities that require creativity, critical thinking, and human expertise—unleashing the potential for continuous innovation while unlocking new avenues for problem-solving.
features: Work from your home or your friend’s home or your friend’s friend’s home or our office in Pune – you choose!
Comprehensive health plan-We do, really believe in health first!
Quarterly Workation-Work from striking locations across the country, every quarter!
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Empowering enterprises and humans alike with Cognitive Process Automation through AI co-workers!
ShortDescription: E42 is a no-code Cognitive Process Automation (CPA) platform to build AI.
enhanced_description: E42 is a leading AI and NLP-powered no-code Cognitive Process Automation (CPA) platform designed to build AI co-workers. It automates complex people- and process-centric processes across various functions, enabling enterprises to achieve significant cost savings, foster innovation, and drive sustainable growth. By automating tedious and time-consuming tasks, E42 allows employees to concentrate on high-value activities requiring creativity, critical thinking, and human expertise, thereby unlocking continuous innovation and problem-solving. A key business objective supported by E42 is accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, contributing to improved training effectiveness within organizations. The platform's capabilities are aimed at digitally transforming enterprises by making them intelligent, one AI co-worker at a time.
key_use_cases: Achieving significant cost savings through automation
Freeing up human employees for high-value, creative, and critical thinking tasks
competitive_advantages: No-code platform for building AI co-workers
Enables huge cost savings for enterprises
Drives innovation and disruption within enterprises
Facilitates focus on high-value human activities (creativity, critical thinking, human expertise)
implementation_scenarios: Building and deploying AI co-workers to automate business processes across functions
Implementing cognitive process automation for specific business needs
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (specifically skill development and training effectiveness)
General HR process automation (for people-centric processes)
roi_benefits: Enhanced employee focus on high-value activities
primary_users: Business users or developers building automation solutions via the no-code platform
Employees interacting with AI co-workers and automated processes
